attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Henry Allingham.

112 Years old, and the oldest living WW1 Veteran.

It is time this hero was given a knighthood. Instead of retired Football players,Olympic athletes and Musicians.

This has been rejected by your office once.
At a time when the Government is as popular as the Flu. I thought you would like to be involved in honouring Henry Allingham. If it wasn't for him and 1000's of others like him, you  would not have your liberty and be able to send me or anyone messages, Whilst sitting in your Plush London Offices

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
